cause.description:
Join this (satirical) cause to show the world that you don't really care about global warming. Hell, we even encourage you to pollute the environment!
(Note: This is a joke.)
1. Global warming must happen, and it must happen now.
2. Warm winters are cool.
3. Who cares about the negative effects of global warming? We will not be around once it actually gets bad.
cause.mission: pollute the environment in the name of global warming.
cause.name: Support Global Warming
